name: dip721
description: This package provides the DIP-721 developer utility scripts
author: Helder Oliveira <helder@fleek.co>

scripts.cap:start: cd ./cap && dfx deploy ic-history-router && mkdir -p ../.temp && dfx canister id ic-history-router > ../.temp/ic-history-router-id
scripts.dev:watch: cargo watch -w ./nft/src -s 'yarn reset && dfx start --background && yes Y | SKIP_PROMPTS=1 yarn dip721:healthcheck'
